name: archetypically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is very typical of something, or is the original model of something from which others are copied: He is an archetypically decent fellow. These texts are in an archetypically Spanish idiom. See
archetype
More examplesFewer examplesAny sci-fi enthusiast will tell you that most films about apocalyptic disease are archetypically revenge-of-nature scenarios.The setup of the play is archetypically Irish.The scene could have been archetypically Anglican, except for a statue of St Joan of Arc.
